title: Forest Gnome
content:
Forest Gnome Racial Features Gnome Cunning Base Racial Speed Subrace Traits Darkvision

Gnome Cunning Base Racial Speed

Forest Gnome is a Subrace of Gnome in Baldur's Gate 3. Forest Gnome has the ability to speak with animals. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them have Sub-Races which provide different Features and Traits.

BG3 Full Game Note: In the full launch of Baldur's Gate 3, Ability Score Points for Races that were present in Early Access are removed. And instead, Ability Score Points in the full game correspond with the Class players will choose.

Even smaller than their cousins and twice as reclusive, forest gnomes are a rare sight in Faerûn. They master magic and craftsmanship in their distant, idyllic groves.

Forest Gnome Traits:

Darkvision: Can see in the dark up to 12 m. Spell: Speak with Animals

Forest Gnome Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Forest Gnome race used to feature +2 Intelligence and +1 Dexterity. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose. ?? ??
